name: Third Day
description: '''Third Day''' is a [[Christian rock]] band formed in [[Marietta, Georgia]] in 1991. The band was founded by lead singer [[Mac Powell]], guitarist [[Mark David Lee|Mark Lee]] (the only constant members) and Billy Wilkins. The band's name is a reference to the biblical accounts of the [[resurrection of Jesus]] on the third day following his crucifixion. The band was inducted into the [[Georgia Music Hall of Fame]] on September 19, 2009. They have sold over 7 million albums in the United States and had 28 number one Christian album chart radio hits. Their fans are known as "Gomers" after a song on their second album about [[Gomer (wife of Hosea)|Gomer]]. Though they dissolved in 2018 following a farewell tour, they reunited in 2025 for a limited 30th anniversary tour to take place in 2026.
